ServiceTerritoryRelationship.name: ServiceTerritoryRelationship
ServiceTerritoryRelationship.description: Represents the relationship between service territories based on work types performed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the service territory relationship.

RelatedServiceTerritoryId.description: The related service territory that's associated with a work type.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The service territory that's associated with a work type.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type that's performed at a service territory.
